title: Was Donald Trump the first president in 56 years not visiting Arlington National Cemetery on Veterans' Day?
subtitle: The Presidents sometimes express their support for the United States Forces on Veterans' Day in places other than Arlington National Cemetery.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: November 2018 saw the first Veterans' Day in 56 years when the incumbent President of the United States did not attend a wreath transplant ceremony in the tomb of the unknown soldier at Arlington National Cemetery.
